game_state: Player B activates "Royal Decree". Player A controls "Mystical Space Typhoon".
query: Can Player A chain "Mystical Space Typhoon" to the activation of "Royal Decree"?
expected_explanation: A Quick-Play Spell can be chained to a Trap activation.

game_state: Player A controls a face-up "Skill Drain". Player B summons "Jinzo".
query: Does "Jinzo" negate "Skill Drain"?
expected_explanation: "Skill Drain" is already active and negates Jinzo's effect on summon.

cards: ['Geomathmech Final Sigma', 'Gameciel, the Sea Turtle Kaiju']
game_state: Player A controls "Geomathmech Final Sigma" in the Extra Monster Zone. Player B have "Gameciel, the Sea Turtle Kaiju" in their hand.
query: Can "Geomathmech Final Sigma" be Tributed for the special summon of "Gameciel, the Sea Turtle Kaiju"?
expected_explanation: "Geomathmech Final Sigma" can be tributed as cost to activate an effect, like the special summon of "Gameciel, the Sea Turtle Kaiju"

game_state: Player A controls "Geomathmech Final Sigma" in the Extra Monster Zone. Player B activates "The Monarchs Stormforth".
query: Can "Geomathmech Final Sigma" be Tributed by the effect of "The Monarchs Stormforth"?
expected_explanation: "Geomathmech Final Sigma" can not be tributed by the effect of cards, except "Mathmech" cards, while in the Extra Monster Zone.

game_state: Player A special summons "Mathmech Sigma" by its own effect and it is then used to summon an Xyz monster.
query: Is "Mathmech Sigma" still banished when it is detached as Xyz material?
expected_explanation: Since "Mathmech Sigma" was used as material for an Xyz summon it is no longer treated as a card on the field, and is sent to the Graveyard.

game_state: Player A Xyz summons "Primathmech Laplacian" and uses its trigger effect, detaching 3 materials.
query: Does the trigger effect of Primathmech Laplacian target?
expected_explanation: No, it does not. Cards to be sent to the Graveyard are chosen at resolution.

game_state: Player A Synchro summons "Geomathmech Magma". Player B activates "Solemn Judgment" to negate the summon and destroys "Geomathmech Magma".
query: Can the search effect of "Geomathmech Magma" be activated?
expected_explanation: "Geomathmech Magma" says "this card in its owner possession..." so the search effect can be activated whenever "Geomathmech Magma" is destroyed, even if it was not properly summoned first.

game_state: Player A controls a set "Mathmech Induction" and has declared an attack.
query: Can "Mathmech Induction" be activated during the Damage Step?
expected_explanation: "Mathmech Induction" can be activated at the Start of the Damage Step before performing Damage calculation

game_state: Player A activates the second effect of "Mathmech Superfactorial", targeting 3 "Mathmech" monsters in the Graveyard to perform an Xyz summon. Player B chains "D.D. Crow", banishing one of the targets.
query: Will the effect of "Mathmech Superfactorial" resolve?
expected_explanation: If one of the targeted monsters no longer exists in the Graveyard when resolving a "Mathmech Superfactorial" that was activated targeting three monsters, the two remaining monsters are Special Summoned. Then, if there is an Xyz Monster in your Extra Deck that can be Xyz Summoned using those two Special Summoned monsters, immediately after "Mathmech Superfactorial" resolves, Xyz Summon such a monster.

game_state: Player A activates "Mathmech Superfactorial".
query: Can Player A target a "Mathmech" Xyz monster in the Graveyard and special summon it?
expected_explanation: You must be able to resolve "Mathmech Superfactorial" at activation: since a Xyz monster does not have a level it can not be used for a Synchro or Xyz summon and thus it is not a legal target.

game_state: Player A controls a face-up "Macro Cosmos".
query: Can Player B activate the first effect of "Mathmech Circular" while "Macro Cosmos" is face up on the field?
expected_explanation: Since "Macro Cosmos" banishes all cards sent to the Graveyard, Player B are not able to pay the cost required by "Mathmech Circular" for summoning itself.

game_state: Player A controls a face-up Beast-Type monster. Player B activates "Raigeki" and destroys the Beast-Type monster.
query: Can Player A Special Summon multiple "Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest"?
expected_explanation: Even though the effect of "Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest" is not an Only once per chain effect, Player A cannot Special Summon multiple "Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest", even if Player A has multiple copies of "Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest" in their Hand/Graveyard.

game_state: Player A's "Peten the Dark Clown" is destroyed by the effect of Player B's "Soul Taker"
query: Can Player A activate the effect of "Peten the Dark Clown"?
expected_explanation: The effect of "Peten the Dark Clown" is a "When...You can..." effect, and misses timing due to the effect of "Soul Taker".

game_state: Player A controls "Formula Synchron". Player B. controls "Light and Darkness Dragon" with the following stats ATK/DEF 2800/2400, and tries to leave Main Phase 1 and enter the Battle Phase.
query: Can Player A activate the quick effect of "Formula Synchron" multiple times?
expected_explanation: The quick effect of "Formula Synchron" can be activated multiple times, just not on the same chain, each activation is negated by the quick effect of "Light and Darkness Dragon" until it no longer can pay the cost to activate the quick effect

game_state: Player A Normal Summons a monster, triggering the effect of Player B's "Future Visions". Player A chains "Book of Moon" targeting the Normal Summoned monster
query: Is the monster still banished by the effect of "Future Vision"?
expected_explanation: The monster still banished by the effect of "Future Vision" after being flipped face-down by "Book of Moon", since the target do not need to meet the target requirements at resolution, only when targeted.

game_state: Player A controls "Spirit Reaper". Player B activates "Book of Moon" targeting "Spirit Reaper".
query: Is "Spirit Reaper" destroyed?
expected_explanation: "Spirit Reaper" is face-down after the effect of "Book of Moon" finishes resolving, so "Spirit Reaper" is not destroyed.

game_state: Player A Flip Summons a "Karakuri" monster, while controlling a face-up "Karakuri Anatomy".
query: Will a Karakuri Counter be placed on "Karakuri Anatomy"?
expected_explanation: Flip Summmoning a monster counts as changing its battle position.

game_state: Player A controls a set "Torrential Tribute" and declares a direct attack on Player B. Player B Special Summons "Battle Fader"
query: Can Player A activate "Torrential Tribute"?
expected_explanation: When Player B resolve the effect of "Battle Fader" they Special Summon "Battle Fader" and then end the Battle Phase. "Torrential Tribute" cannot be activated because ending the Battle Phase is the last thing to happen.

game_state: Player A controls "Relinquished" equiped with Player B's "Archlord Kristya". Player B attacks "Relinquished" with a monster that would destroy "Relinquished" by battle, which destroys the equiped "Archlord Kristya".
query: Does "Archlord Kristya" return to the top of the Deck?
expected_explanation: "Archlord Kristya" will return to the top of the Deck, since it is still considered face-up on the field while being equiped to "Relinquished".

game_state: Player A sends a Synchro monster to the Graveyard by the effect of "Gale Dogra"
query: Can Player A use the effect of "Monster Reborn" to Special Summon this Synchro monster?
expected_explanation: Player A cannot use the effect of "Monster Reborn" to Special Summon the Synchro monster from the Graveyard, because the Synchro monster has to be properly Special Summoned first, before it can be Special Summoned by another card's effect.
